name: Greetings byGosh
author: Kenny Moore

sections.description:
Greetings byGosh is a simple, free plugin that supplements the standard greeting “Howdy” in the WordPress admin dashboard. It displays a random greeting from around the world – the equivalent of “Hello” in 16 different languages. “Howdy” is also included in the rotation because I am fond of it, it just gets a little monotonous on its own.

Greetings byGosh has only been tested with the English language version of WordPress.

This update: (1) Tested with WordPress 5.6.1; (2) Added two new greetings in honor of Kamala Harris, the first female Vice President of the United States: ‘Wah Gwaan’ (Jamaican), and ‘Vanakkam’ (Tamil).

If you enjoy Greetings byGosh, please leave a review. If this plugin gives you any grief, please post on the support page. I’ll do my best to fix any problems.

The greetings …
American slang: Howdy
Arabic: Marhabaan
Bengali: Hyālō
English: Hello
French: Bonjour
Hausa: Sannu
Hawaiian: Aloha
Hindi: Namaste
Jamaican: Wah Gwaan
Japanese: Kon’nichiwa
Malaysian: Helo
Mandarin Chinese: Nǐ hǎo
Portuguese: Olá
Punjabi: Sata srī akāla
Russian: Privet
Spanish: Hola
Tamil: Vanakkam

Greetings byGosh was developed and is maintained by Kenny Moore. It is inspired by TM Replace Howdy, which I enjoyed but is no longer maintained.

License

Greetings byGosh is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
the Free Software Foundation, either version 2 of the License, or any later version.

Greetings byGosh is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html
sections.installation: Install and activate Greetings byGosh through the Plugins screen in the WordPress admin dashboard
sections.faq:
1. That’s it? That’s all it does?

Yes. In a planned future version the list of greetings will be editable – you will be able to add to it, subtract from it, or change it out completely. For example you might prefer funny or inspirational sayings instead of greetings.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

Original version

1.0.1

Tested with WordPress 5.6.1; Added greetings in Jamaican and Tamil

screenshots.caption: Wordpress admin dashboard, showing "Howdy, Kenny" changed to "Kon'nichiwa, Kenny".
